title: FS: M101-3 Sporting News Walter Johnson / Street Postcard
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: M101-3 Sporting News Walter Johnson / Street Postcard
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,
Available for sale is a stunning M101-3 Sporting News postcard of Walter Johnson and Gabby Street. Card is in beautiful condition with four touched corners and the back is super clean too! Price is "SOLD" including expedited shipping from Canada (with tracking and insurance). You probably won't find a nicer one that's not graded. PM or post if interested and thanks for looking.
Jeff

Sold! Wojo/Street is in the mail Monday.
Jeff
